data.content:
Renekton (Galactic Renekton)

Cost: 1350 RP | Release Date: August 27, 2020

Renekton, the Butcher of the Sands, is a fearsome champion in the popular online game League of Legends. Known for his brutal strength and relentless aggression, Renekton has become a favorite pick for players who enjoy dominating their opponents in the top lane. With his new skin,

players can now experience the power of this mighty champion in a whole new cosmic style.

The Story of Galactic Renekton

In the vast reaches of the universe, where stars and galaxies collide, a cosmic force awakened within Renekton. Drawn to the power of the celestial bodies, he embraced the energy of the cosmos and transformed into Galactic Renekton. With his new form, Renekton became a cosmic warrior, wielding the power of the stars to crush his enemies.

The Galactic Renekton skin features a stunning visual redesign that takes inspiration from the wonders of the universe. Renekton's armor is adorned with intricate cosmic patterns, glowing with the brilliance of distant stars. His weapon, a celestial blade, crackles with cosmic energy, ready to strike down any who dare to challenge him.

But it's not just the visual design that sets Galactic Renekton apart. The skin also includes new spell effects and animations that further enhance the cosmic theme. Renekton's abilities now unleash bursts of cosmic energy, leaving trails of stardust in his wake. His ultimate ability, Dominus, transforms him into a towering cosmic being, radiating power and awe-inspiring presence.

Whether you're a fan of Renekton or simply appreciate the beauty of the cosmos, Galactic Renekton is a skin that is sure to impress. With its stunning visuals and cosmic theme, it offers a fresh and exciting way to experience the power of this fearsome champion.

The Story of Renekton

Renekton, once a proud warrior of the Shuriman Empire, was betrayed and left to die in the unforgiving sands of the Shurima Desert. Consumed by rage and driven mad by the scorching heat, he emerged as a twisted and vengeful being known as the Butcher of the Sands.

In the game, Renekton is a melee champion who excels at close-quarters combat. His kit revolves around dealing massive damage and disrupting his opponents with his ferocious abilities. With his Q ability, Cull the Meek, Renekton swings his blade in a wide arc, damaging enemies and healing himself for a portion of the damage dealt. His W ability, Ruthless Predator, allows him to stun his target and unleash a flurry of devastating strikes. Renekton's E ability, Slice and Dice, allows him to dash through enemies, dealing damage and gaining increased mobility. Finally, his ultimate ability, Dominus, empowers him, increasing his size, health, and granting him bonus damage.

Renekton's playstyle is aggressive and relentless, making him a formidable force in the top lane. His high damage output and crowd control abilities make him a threat to squishy champions, while his tankiness allows him to withstand punishment in extended fights. However, Renekton's early game dominance can sometimes be offset by his lackluster scaling into the late game. As the game progresses, he may struggle to deal with heavily armored opponents or champions with high sustain.

Despite his weaknesses, Renekton has found his place in the game as a strong laner and a potent team fighter. His ability to dive into the enemy backline and disrupt their carries can turn the tide of team fights in his team's favor. Renekton's presence on the battlefield is always felt, as he slashes through his enemies with unmatched brutality.

On this page, you can find information and videos about all the appearances of Renekton, including his base skin and other exciting alternate skins. Whether you prefer the cosmic might of Galactic Renekton or the savage brutality of his other forms, Renekton offers a thrilling and satisfying gameplay experience for those who seek to dominate the top lane.

Renekton: The Butcher of the Sands

Release Date: January 18, 2011

Renekton, the Butcher of the Sands, is a fearsome champion in the popular online game League of Legends. With his imposing figure and deadly abilities, Renekton strikes fear into the hearts of his enemies on the battlefield. In this article, we will delve into the lore behind Renekton, explore his strengths and weaknesses, and discuss his role in the game.

Lore and Background

Renekton's story is deeply intertwined with that of his brother, Nasus, the Curator of the Sands. Both brothers were once Ascended warriors of Shurima, a powerful empire that fell into ruin. Renekton and Nasus fought side by side, defending their empire against its enemies. However, their loyalty and dedication to Shurima ultimately led to their downfall.

When the emperor of Shurima, Azir, attempted to ascend to godhood, his ritual went awry, resulting in the destruction of the empire. Renekton and Nasus were trapped in the ruins, buried beneath the sands for centuries. The passage of time and the corruption of the Void twisted Renekton's mind, turning him into a savage beast consumed by rage and bloodlust.

Now freed from his sandy prison, Renekton seeks to unleash his fury upon the world. He is driven by an insatiable hunger for violence and revenge, forever tormented by his past and the memories of his lost empire. Renekton's appearance reflects his descent into madness, with his once-golden armor now tarnished and his eyes burning with a fiery rage.

Strengths and Weaknesses

Renekton is a formidable champion with a unique set of strengths and weaknesses. His kit is designed to excel in close-quarters combat, making him a fearsome duelist and a potent threat in team fights.

One of Renekton's greatest strengths is his ability to sustain himself in battle. His passive ability, Reign of Anger, empowers his abilities when he is below 50% health, allowing him to heal for a portion of the damage dealt. This makes Renekton incredibly difficult to kill, especially in extended engagements.

Renekton's Q ability, Cull the Meek, is a versatile tool that deals damage to enemies in a small area while also healing Renekton for a portion of the damage dealt. This ability allows him to trade effectively in lane and sustain through poke damage. Additionally, Cull the Meek can be empowered by Renekton's Fury resource, increasing its damage and healing.

Another key aspect of Renekton's kit is his W ability, Ruthless Predator. This ability empowers Renekton's next basic attack, stunning his target and dealing bonus damage. Ruthless Predator is a crucial tool for engaging on enemies and locking down priority targets, making Renekton a potent threat in skirmishes and team fights.

Renekton's E ability, Slice and Dice, is a mobility tool that allows him to dash through enemies, dealing damage and reducing their armor. This ability provides Renekton with excellent engage and disengage potential, making him a slippery and unpredictable opponent.

However, Renekton does have his weaknesses. His early game dominance can be mitigated by champions with strong ranged poke or crowd control abilities. Additionally, Renekton's reliance on Fury management means that he can be predictable in his trading patterns, allowing opponents to play around his resource bar.

Renekton's Role in the Game

In the game, Renekton is primarily played in the top lane, where his dueling prowess and ability to bully opponents shine. He excels in short trades and all-ins, making him a lane bully that can snowball an early advantage. Renekton's strong laning phase allows him to pressure the enemy top laner, denying them farm and experience.

Renekton's role in team fights is that of a frontline bruiser. With his tankiness and crowd control, he can disrupt the enemy backline and create opportunities for his team to follow up. Renekton's ultimate ability, Dominus, empowers him, increasing his maximum health, dealing damage to nearby enemies, and providing him with a constant Fury generation. This ultimate turns Renekton into a terrifying force, capable of soaking up damage and wreaking havoc in the midst of battle.

Renekton's versatility also allows him to be played in other roles, such as the jungle or even mid lane, although these are less common. In the jungle, Renekton's early game strength and mobility make him a potent ganker, capable of diving onto unsuspecting enemies. In the mid lane, Renekton can utilize his burst damage and mobility to roam and impact other lanes.

Conclusion

Renekton, the Butcher of the Sands, is a fearsome champion with a rich lore and a unique playstyle. His story of betrayal and madness adds depth to his character, while his strengths and weaknesses make him a challenging champion to master. Whether you're looking to dominate the top lane or unleash chaos in team fights, Renekton is a force to be reckoned with.

For more information on Renekton's skins and gameplay videos, be sure to visit our website's dedicated page for the Butcher of the Sands.

Renekton (Prehistoric Renekton)

Cost: 975 RP | Release Date: November 19, 2012

Renekton, the Butcher of the Sands, is a fearsome champion in the popular online game League of Legends. Known for his brutal strength and relentless aggression, Renekton has become a favorite pick for players who enjoy dominating their opponents in the top lane. With his Prehistoric Renekton skin, players can take a step back in time and unleash their inner primal instincts.

The Story of Prehistoric Renekton

Prehistoric Renekton is a skin that transforms Renekton into a fearsome dinosaur-like creature, reminiscent of the ancient reptiles that once roamed the earth. With his scaly green skin, sharp teeth, and menacing spikes, Prehistoric Renekton embodies the raw power and primal fury of a prehistoric predator.

The skin features unique visual effects that enhance the theme, such as fossilized bones and rocks that shatter upon impact. Renekton's abilities also receive a makeover, with his Q ability, Cull the Meek, transforming into a powerful bite attack, and his ultimate, Dominus, summoning a volcanic eruption.

Released on November 19, 2012, Prehistoric Renekton quickly became a fan-favorite skin due to its impressive design and thematic appeal. It offers players a chance to experience Renekton in a whole new light, embracing his savage nature and unleashing devastation on the Rift.

The Story of Renekton

Renekton, the Butcher of the Sands, is a champion with a tragic past. Once a proud warrior of the Ascended, Renekton and his brother Nasus were tasked with guarding the ancient empire of Shurima. However, their destinies took a dark turn when they fell victim to the treachery of Xerath, a fellow Ascended who sought to seize power for himself.

During a ritual gone wrong, Xerath's betrayal caused a cataclysmic event that destroyed the empire of Shurima and transformed Renekton and Nasus into monstrous beings. Renekton, consumed by rage and madness, became a savage beast known as the Butcher of the Sands.

Renekton's story in League of Legends revolves around his eternal struggle to regain his sanity and seek revenge against Xerath. He is driven by an insatiable hunger for vengeance, constantly battling his inner demons while wreaking havoc on the battlefield.

Strengths and Weaknesses

Renekton is a champion known for his early game dominance and ability to bully opponents in the top lane. His kit is designed to excel in short trades and all-ins, making him a formidable duelist. With his Q ability, Cull the Meek, Renekton can sustain himself in fights while dealing significant damage to his enemies.

One of Renekton's greatest strengths is his ability to dive into team fights and disrupt the enemy backline. His E ability, Slice and Dice, allows him to dash through enemies, closing the gap and stunning his targets with his W ability, Ruthless Predator. Renekton's ultimate, Dominus, grants him increased health, damage, and an area-of-effect damage aura, making him a force to be reckoned with in team fights.

However, Renekton does have his weaknesses. While he excels in the early game, he can struggle against champions who outscale him in the late game. Additionally, Renekton relies heavily on his abilities to deal damage, making him vulnerable when his abilities are on cooldown. Skilled opponents can exploit these windows of opportunity to trade effectively or disengage from fights.

Renekton's Place in the Game

Renekton is primarily played in the top lane, where his aggressive playstyle and strong laning phase allow him to dominate his opponents. He is often picked as a counter to melee champions or as a lane bully against squishy champions who struggle to withstand his early game pressure.

Renekton's role in the game is to create chaos in team fights and disrupt the enemy team's backline. With his tankiness and crowd control abilities, he can dive into the enemy team, soaking up damage and locking down priority targets. Renekton's presence in team fights can turn the tide in favor of his team, allowing them to secure objectives and push for victory.

Overall, Renekton is a versatile champion who excels in the early game and can snowball his advantage to carry his team to victory. With his Prehistoric Renekton skin, players can unleash their inner primal instincts and dominate the Rift in a truly fearsome fashion.

For more information about Renekton and to see all of his appearances in the game, including the Prehistoric Renekton skin, visit the official League of Legends website or check out the champion spotlight videos available on various platforms.

Renekton (Scorched Earth Renekton)

Cost: 975 RP | Release Date: August 9, 2012

Renekton, the Butcher of the Sands, is a fearsome champion in the popular online game League of Legends. Known for his brutal strength and relentless aggression, Renekton has become a favorite pick for players who enjoy dominating their opponents in the top lane. With his powerful abilities and unique playstyle, Renekton has carved a place for himself in the competitive scene and has earned a reputation as a formidable force to be reckoned with.

One of Renekton's most iconic skins is

Released on August 9, 2012, this skin offers players a visually stunning and thematic transformation for the champion. In this article, we will delve into the story behind Scorched Earth Renekton and explore all the intricate details of this fiery costume.

The Story of Scorched Earth Renekton

Scorched Earth Renekton takes inspiration from a post-apocalyptic world where fire and destruction reign supreme. In this alternate reality, Runeterra has been ravaged by cataclysmic events, leaving behind a desolate wasteland. Renekton, once a proud warrior, has succumbed to the chaos and embraced the destructive power of fire.

The skin features Renekton adorned in armor that reflects the scorched landscape he now calls home. His once vibrant scales have turned a fiery red, symbolizing his affinity for flames. The armor itself is rugged and battle-worn, showcasing the wear and tear of countless battles fought in this harsh environment. Renekton's weapon, a massive flaming axe, embodies his newfound destructive nature.

With Scorched Earth Renekton, players can experience the thrill of playing as a fearsome warrior who has fully embraced the chaos and devastation of a world consumed by fire. The skin's visual effects and animations further enhance the immersive experience, making every ability cast and attack feel even more impactful.

A Brief Narrative of Renekton's Story

Renekton's story within the League of Legends universe is a tragic one. Once a noble warrior and the brother of Nasus, the Curator of the Sands, Renekton was a guardian of ancient Shurima. However, the fall of Shurima and the betrayal of Azir, the Emperor of the Sands, changed everything.

During the cataclysmic event known as the Rune Wars, Renekton and Nasus were trapped in the sands of the Shuriman desert for centuries. The isolation and corruption of the dark magic within the sands twisted Renekton's mind, turning him into a savage beast consumed by rage and bloodlust.

When the League of Legends was formed, Renekton was brought into the arena as a champion, his immense power harnessed for the entertainment of the summoners. However, his true purpose remained hidden. Renekton yearned for revenge against his brother Nasus and sought to unleash his fury upon him.

Renekton's gameplay reflects his aggressive and relentless nature. With his abilities, he can slice through enemies with his blade, stun them with his ruthless strikes, and even transform into a massive crocodile, gaining increased strength and durability. His playstyle rewards players who enjoy diving into the heart of the battle and wreaking havoc upon their foes.

Renekton's Place in the Game

Renekton is primarily played in the top lane, where his dominance and dueling potential shine. His early game strength allows him to bully opponents and establish lane control, making him a formidable laner. Renekton's ability to sustain himself in fights with his Q ability, Cull the Meek, and his ultimate, Dominus, grants him the survivability needed to dive into team fights and disrupt the enemy backline.

However, Renekton does have weaknesses. His reliance on fury management can make him predictable, as opponents can anticipate his empowered abilities. Additionally, his late-game scaling falls off compared to other champions, making it crucial for Renekton players to establish an early advantage and snowball their lead to secure victory.

Despite these weaknesses, Renekton remains a popular pick in both casual and competitive play. His aggressive playstyle and ability to dominate the top lane make him a favorite among players who enjoy asserting their dominance and controlling the flow of the game.

On this page, you can find information and videos showcasing all of Renekton's appearances, including the fearsome Scorched Earth Renekton skin. Whether you're a fan of Renekton's lore, interested in mastering his gameplay, or simply appreciate the visual design of his skins, this page is your go-to resource for all things Renekton.

So, dive into the world of Renekton, the Butcher of the Sands, and experience the thrill of playing as a powerful crocodile warrior. Unleash your fury, dominate your opponents, and conquer the top lane with the fiery might of Scorched Earth Renekton!

Renekton (Rune Wars Renekton)

RP Cost: 975 RP

Release Date: August 1, 2012

Renekton, the Butcher of the Sands, is a fearsome champion in the popular online game League of Legends. Known for his brutal strength and relentless aggression, Renekton has become a favorite pick for players who enjoy dominating their opponents in the top lane. With his Rune Wars Renekton skin, he takes on a new, visually stunning appearance that adds an extra layer of excitement to his gameplay.

The Rune Wars Renekton skin was released on August 1, 2012, and quickly became a hit among players. Priced at 975 RP, this skin offers a unique and captivating look for Renekton, transforming him into a warrior from the Rune Wars era. With its intricate details and vibrant colors, the Rune Wars Renekton skin truly stands out on the battlefield.

Renekton's Rune Wars skin features a complete overhaul of his appearance, from his armor to his weapon. The skin showcases Renekton as a battle-hardened warrior, adorned with ancient runes and symbols that enhance his menacing presence. His armor is intricately designed, with sharp edges and a weathered look that reflects the countless battles he has fought. The skin also introduces new particle effects, adding a touch of magic to Renekton's abilities.

One of the most striking aspects of the Rune Wars Renekton skin is his weapon, a massive, rune-infused blade that glows with power. As Renekton unleashes his devastating abilities, the blade crackles with energy, leaving a trail of mystical runes in its wake. This visual effect adds an extra layer of intensity to Renekton's gameplay, making every strike feel impactful and satisfying.

Renekton's story within the League of Legends universe is as captivating as his appearance. Once a revered warrior of the Shuriman empire, Renekton and his brother Nasus were transformed by the dark magic of Xerath, an ancient and powerful being. While Nasus gained wisdom and became the Curator of the Sands, Renekton was consumed by rage and became a savage beast, known as the Butcher of the Sands.

In the game, Renekton is a melee bruiser who excels at diving into the enemy team and wreaking havoc. His abilities allow him to deal massive damage while sustaining himself through his resource, Fury. Renekton's passive, Reign of Anger, empowers his abilities when he has enough Fury, making him a formidable force in team fights. His Q ability, Cull the Meek, damages enemies in a cone and heals Renekton based on the number of targets hit. His W ability, Ruthless Predator, allows him to stun a target and deal additional damage. Renekton's E ability, Slice and Dice, lets him dash through enemies, dealing damage and reducing their armor. Finally, his ultimate ability, Dominus, transforms Renekton into a giant, empowering him with bonus health, increased size, and an area-of-effect damage aura.

Renekton's strengths lie in his early game dominance and his ability to bully opponents in the top lane. With his high base damage and sustain, he can easily win trades and establish lane control. Renekton's mobility also allows him to engage or disengage fights effectively, making him a versatile champion in team compositions. However, Renekton's weaknesses become apparent in the late game, where he can struggle to deal with tankier opponents and falls off in damage compared to other champions. Additionally, his reliance on Fury management can be a challenge for players to master, as mistimed abilities can leave him vulnerable.

Renekton's place in the game is primarily as a top lane bruiser, where he can dominate his lane and create pressure for his team. His ability to dive into the backline and disrupt enemy carries makes him a valuable asset in team fights. Renekton's presence on the battlefield demands attention from the enemy team, allowing his allies to capitalize on the chaos he creates. With the Rune Wars Renekton skin, players can now showcase their mastery of this powerful champion in a visually stunning way.

On this page, you can find information and videos about all of Renekton's appearances, including the Rune Wars Renekton skin. Whether you're a fan of his classic look or want to explore the different visual themes available, this page is your go-to resource for all things Renekton.

Renekton (PROJECT: Renekton)

RP Cost: 1350 RP

Release Date: August 1, 2019

Renekton, the Butcher of the Sands, is a fearsome champion in the popular online game League of Legends. Known for his brutal strength and relentless aggression, Renekton has become a fan-favorite among players who enjoy dominating their opponents in the top lane. With his PROJECT: Renekton skin, this already formidable champion takes on a futuristic and cybernetic appearance, adding a new level of excitement to his gameplay.

The PROJECT: Renekton skin was released on August 1, 2019, as part of the PROJECT skin line, which features champions transformed into high-tech, augmented versions of themselves. Renekton's PROJECT skin showcases him as a cybernetic warrior, complete with glowing blue eyes, metallic armor, and a menacing presence on the battlefield.

With this skin, Renekton's abilities receive a futuristic makeover, enhancing his already devastating attacks. His Q ability, Cull the Meek, now emits a neon blue energy wave, slicing through enemies with a technological precision. His W ability, Ruthless Predator, delivers electrifying strikes, leaving enemies stunned and overwhelmed. The E ability, Slice and Dice, allows Renekton to dash through enemies with a burst of energy, leaving a trail of digital effects in his wake. Finally, his ultimate ability, Dominus, transforms him into a towering cybernetic monstrosity, radiating power and instilling fear in his enemies.

Renekton's PROJECT skin not only offers a visually stunning transformation but also provides a unique audio experience. With this skin, Renekton's voice lines are altered to reflect his new cybernetic nature, adding an extra layer of immersion to the gameplay. The sound effects accompanying his abilities are also modified, creating a futuristic and high-tech atmosphere that perfectly complements the skin's theme.

Now, let's delve into the lore and story behind Renekton, the Butcher of the Sands. Renekton was once a proud warrior of the Ascended, an ancient race of god-like beings who defended the world of Runeterra. Alongside his brother Nasus, Renekton fought valiantly against the forces of darkness, protecting the fragile balance of the world.

However, during a fateful battle against the Void, Renekton was corrupted and consumed by its dark power. Twisted and driven mad, he became a monstrous embodiment of rage and brutality. Imprisoned beneath the sands of Shurima, Renekton's mind deteriorated further, leaving him a savage and bloodthirsty beast.

In the game, Renekton is a melee champion who excels in close-quarters combat. His kit revolves around dealing massive damage to his enemies while sustaining himself through his abilities. Renekton's passive ability, Reign of Anger, empowers his abilities when he is below 50% health, allowing him to unleash devastating combos and turn the tide of battle.

Renekton's Q ability, Cull the Meek, is a sweeping strike that damages enemies and heals Renekton based on the number of targets hit. This ability is crucial for sustaining in lane and trading with opponents. His W ability, Ruthless Predator, empowers his next basic attack, stunning the target and dealing bonus damage. This ability is a key tool for engaging and locking down enemies.

The E ability, Slice and Dice, allows Renekton to dash forward, damaging all enemies in his path. This ability can be used both offensively and defensively, allowing Renekton to quickly close the gap or escape from dangerous situations. Finally, his ultimate ability, Dominus, transforms Renekton into a massive crocodile, increasing his size, health, and granting him bonus damage. This ability turns Renekton into an unstoppable force, capable of diving into the enemy team and wreaking havoc.

Renekton's strengths lie in his early game dominance and ability to bully opponents in the top lane. With his high base damage and sustain, he can easily win trades and establish lane control. His mobility and crowd control also make him a formidable duelist, capable of outplaying opponents and securing kills.

However, Renekton does have weaknesses that players must be aware of. His reliance on fury management can make him predictable, as his abilities become more powerful when he is below 50% health. Additionally, Renekton's effectiveness diminishes in the late game, where he can struggle to deal with tankier opponents and coordinated team fights.

In conclusion, Renekton's PROJECT: Renekton skin offers players a visually stunning and immersive experience. With its futuristic design, enhanced abilities, and unique audio effects, this skin truly brings the Butcher of the Sands into the high-tech world of PROJECT. Whether you're a fan of Renekton's aggressive playstyle or simply appreciate the artistry behind the skin, PROJECT: Renekton is a must-have for any League of Legends player.

For more information about Renekton and his various appearances, including videos showcasing his abilities and skins, be sure to visit our dedicated page on the League of Legends website.

Renekton (Dawnbringer Renekton)

Cost: 1350 RP | Release Date: August 6, 2020

Renekton, the Butcher of the Sands, is a fearsome champion in the popular online game League of Legends. Known for his brutal strength and relentless aggression, Renekton has become a fan-favorite among players who enjoy dominating their opponents in the top lane. With his latest skin, Dawnbringer Renekton, players can now experience a new level of power and elegance as they unleash their fury on the Rift.

Dawnbringer Renekton is a legendary skin that was released on August 6, 2020, and is available for purchase at the price of 1350 RP. This skin transforms Renekton into a celestial warrior, adorned in radiant armor and wielding a magnificent golden sword. With its intricate details and stunning visual effects, Dawnbringer Renekton is a true masterpiece that showcases the beauty and grace of the dawn.

The costume features a color palette dominated by shades of gold and white, symbolizing purity and righteousness. Renekton's armor is intricately designed, with ornate patterns and engravings that reflect the celestial theme of the skin. His weapon, a golden sword, gleams with divine energy, leaving a trail of sparkling particles as he slashes through his enemies.

One of the most striking aspects of Dawnbringer Renekton is the transformation of his abilities. Each of his skills has been reimagined to fit the celestial theme, creating a unique and immersive gameplay experience. His Q ability, Cull the Meek, now emits a radiant burst of energy, healing Renekton as he strikes his foes. The W ability, Ruthless Predator, unleashes a flurry of divine strikes, leaving a trail of light in its wake. His E ability, Slice and Dice, allows Renekton to dash through the battlefield with celestial grace, leaving behind a trail of stardust. Finally, his ultimate ability, Dominus, transforms Renekton into a towering celestial being, radiating power and inspiring fear in his enemies.

Renekton's story within the League of Legends universe is one of tragedy and vengeance. Once a proud Ascended warrior, Renekton and his brother Nasus were tasked with guarding the ancient empire of Shurima. However, their loyalty was betrayed by their own brother, Azir, who sought to claim the power of the Sun Disc for himself. In the ensuing battle, Renekton was consumed by the dark powers of the Void and transformed into a monstrous creature, forever tormented by his own rage and thirst for revenge.

In the game, Renekton is a melee champion who excels at close-quarters combat. His strength lies in his ability to deal massive amounts of damage while being incredibly durable. With his Q ability, Cull the Meek, Renekton can heal himself by striking multiple enemies, allowing him to sustain in fights and stay in the thick of the action. His W ability, Ruthless Predator, empowers his next basic attack, dealing bonus damage and stunning his target. This ability is a key component of Renekton's burst combo, allowing him to quickly eliminate squishy targets. His E ability, Slice and Dice, is a versatile mobility tool that allows Renekton to dash through enemies, dealing damage and reducing their armor. Finally, his ultimate ability, Dominus, empowers Renekton, granting him bonus health, increased size, and an area-of-effect damage aura.

Renekton's playstyle revolves around aggressive laning and dominating his opponents. With his high base damage and crowd control abilities, he can easily bully his lane opponent and secure kills. However, Renekton's strength diminishes as the game progresses, and he becomes more reliant on his team to secure objectives and team fights. Proper positioning and timing are crucial for Renekton players to make the most out of his abilities and maximize his impact on the game.

On this page, you can find detailed information and videos showcasing all of Renekton's appearances, including his base skin and other available skins. Whether you prefer the celestial elegance of Dawnbringer Renekton or the savage brutality of his other skins, Renekton offers a thrilling and satisfying gameplay experience for those who seek to dominate the top lane.

Renekton (Default)

Cost: N/A | Release Date: N/A

Renekton, the Butcher of the Sands, is a fearsome champion in the popular online game League of Legends. As one of the original champions released in the game, Renekton has become a staple pick for top lane players due to his powerful abilities and relentless playstyle. While Renekton has received numerous skins over the years, his default appearance remains iconic and true to his lore.

Renekton's default skin showcases his menacing presence on the battlefield. He is depicted as a hulking, reptilian creature with razor-sharp claws and a massive, serrated blade. His armor is adorned with ancient hieroglyphs, reflecting his connection to the Shuriman Empire and his role as a warrior of the sands. Renekton's ferocious appearance perfectly matches his aggressive playstyle, making him a formidable opponent in any match.

Renekton's default skin does not have any additional visual effects or particle changes compared to his other skins. However, it captures the essence of the champion and remains a fan favorite among players. The attention to detail in his design, from the intricate scales on his body to the menacing glare in his eyes, truly brings Renekton to life on the Summoner's Rift.

The Story of Renekton

Renekton's story is deeply intertwined with that of his brother, Nasus, and the fallen empire of Shurima. Once a proud Ascended warrior, Renekton was corrupted by the dark magic of Xerath, the Magus Ascendant. Consumed by rage and madness, Renekton turned against his own people, becoming a merciless butcher on the sands of Shurima.

Renekton's lore paints a tragic picture of a once noble warrior who succumbed to the darkness within. Imprisoned beneath the sands for centuries, Renekton's mind deteriorated, leaving only a shell of his former self. When he is unleashed upon the world once again, Renekton seeks to exact his vengeance on those who wronged him, including his brother Nasus.

In the game, Renekton is a melee bruiser who excels at diving into the enemy team and disrupting their backline. His abilities, such as Cull the Meek, Ruthless Predator, and Dominus, allow him to deal significant damage while sustaining himself in fights. Renekton's ultimate, Dominus, transforms him into a massive, enraged crocodile, increasing his size, health, and damage output.

Renekton's strengths lie in his early game dominance and ability to snowball leads. With his high base damage and crowd control, he can easily bully opponents in lane and secure kills with the help of his jungler. Renekton's mobility and sustain also make him a formidable split-pusher, capable of drawing multiple enemies to deal with his relentless pressure.

However, Renekton does have weaknesses that players must be mindful of. His abilities have relatively high cooldowns, making him vulnerable during their downtime. Additionally, Renekton's late game scaling falls off compared to other champions, making it crucial for players to secure an advantage in the early and mid-game stages. Proper resource management and decision-making are key to maximizing Renekton's potential.

Renekton's place in the game has evolved over the years. While he was initially designed as a top lane bruiser, he has also found success in the jungle role due to his strong early game presence. Renekton's ability to clear camps quickly and his gank potential make him a viable pick in the jungle, especially in aggressive team compositions.

Whether you prefer his default skin or one of his many alternate looks, Renekton remains a force to be reckoned with on the battlefield. Renekton: The Butcher of the Sands

Renekton is a powerful and aggressive champion who excels in close-quarters combat. As a champion with a rich lore and backstory, Renekton's story is intertwined with that of his brother, Nasus, and the ancient civilization of Shurima.

In the game, Renekton is known for his incredible strength and durability, making him a formidable opponent in the top lane. His abilities allow him to deal massive damage to his enemies while also sustaining himself through his resource system, Fury. Renekton's ultimate ability, Dominus, transforms him into a giant, enraged crocodile, increasing his size, health, and damage output, making him a force to be reckoned with in team fights.

Renekton's strengths lie in his ability to dominate the early game. With his high base damage and crowd control abilities, he can easily bully his lane opponent and establish a strong presence in the top lane. His Q ability, Cull the Meek, allows him to sustain himself through the use of his Fury resource, making him difficult to push out of lane. Additionally, his W ability, Ruthless Predator, provides a stun that can be used to lock down enemies and secure kills.

However, Renekton does have his weaknesses. While he excels in the early game, he can struggle in the late game if he doesn't build a significant advantage. As the game progresses, other champions may outscale him in terms of damage and utility, making it harder for Renekton to have the same impact. Additionally, Renekton relies heavily on his abilities to deal damage, which means that if he is unable to use his abilities effectively, his damage output can be significantly reduced.

In terms of his lore, Renekton was once a noble warrior and the right-hand of the Ascended Emperor of Shurima, Azir. However, after the fall of Shurima and the betrayal of his brother Nasus, Renekton was left trapped in the sands for centuries, slowly succumbing to madness and becoming the Butcher of the Sands. Now, he seeks revenge against his brother and anyone who stands in his way.

Renekton's place in the game is primarily as a top lane bruiser. His high damage and tankiness make him a strong pick for players who enjoy aggressive playstyles and dominating their opponents in the early game. Renekton's ability to snowball his lead and become a formidable threat in team fights makes him a valuable asset to any team.

Hextech Renekton: A Technological Marvel

The Story of Renekton

Renekton's story within the League of Legends universe is one of tragedy and vengeance. Once a proud Ascended warrior named Nasus, Renekton and his brother were transformed into powerful beings by the Sun Disc of Shurima. However, the power corrupted Renekton, driving him mad with rage and turning him into a merciless butcher.

In the game, Renekton is a melee champion who excels at close-quarters combat. His kit revolves around dealing damage, sustaining himself in fights, and disrupting the enemy team. With his Q ability, Cull the Meek, Renekton swings his blade, damaging enemies and healing himself for a portion of the damage dealt. His W ability, Ruthless Predator, allows him to stun his target and unleash a devastating combo. Renekton's E ability, Slice and Dice, enables him to dash through enemies, dealing damage and gaining increased mobility. Finally, his ultimate ability, Dominus, empowers him, increasing his size, health, and dealing damage to nearby enemies.

Renekton's strengths lie in his early game dominance and his ability to bully opponents in the top lane. With his high base damage and sustain, he can often win trades and establish lane control. Additionally, his crowd control and mobility make him a formidable threat in team fights, allowing him to dive into the enemy backline and disrupt their carries.

However, Renekton also has weaknesses that players must be aware of. As a melee champion, he is susceptible to kiting and crowd control. Champions with ranged abilities and strong disengage tools can make it difficult for Renekton to engage and stick to his targets. Additionally, Renekton's effectiveness diminishes in the late game, where his damage output becomes less impactful compared to other scaling champions.

Despite his weaknesses, Renekton remains a popular pick in the top lane due to his aggressive playstyle and ability to dominate early game matchups. His Hextech Renekton skin adds an extra layer of excitement for players who want to showcase their mastery of this fearsome champion in a futuristic and visually stunning way.

The Story of Renekton

Renekton's story within the League of Legends universe is one of tragedy and vengeance. Once a proud warrior and the brother of Nasus, the Curator of the Sands, Renekton was transformed into a monstrous being by the dark magic of Xerath, the Magus Ascendant.

In the game, Renekton is a melee champion who excels in close-quarters combat. His kit revolves around dealing damage and sustaining himself in fights. His passive ability, Reign of Anger, empowers his abilities when he is below 50% health, making him a formidable opponent even when on the brink of defeat.

Renekton's strengths lie in his ability to engage and burst down enemies with his combo of abilities. This allows him to sustain himself in fights and stay in the thick of battle for extended periods.

Additionally, Renekton's W ability, Ruthless Predator, empowers his next basic attack, stunning the target and dealing bonus damage. This ability is crucial for locking down enemies and securing kills, making Renekton a potent threat in skirmishes and team fights.

However, Renekton does have weaknesses that players must be mindful of. His abilities have relatively high cooldowns, meaning that mistimed engages or wasted abilities can leave him vulnerable. Additionally, Renekton's mobility is limited, making it challenging for him to escape sticky situations once committed to a fight.

Despite his weaknesses, Renekton remains a popular pick in the top lane due to his ability to dominate lane matchups and snowball into a formidable force. His early game strength and ability to bully opponents make him a nightmare for squishy champions, allowing him to establish lane dominance and control the tempo of the game.

The Story of Renekton

Renekton, the Butcher of the Sands, has a rich and tragic backstory that adds depth to his character and explains his insatiable thirst for bloodshed. Once a proud warrior of the ancient Shuriman empire, Renekton and his brother Nasus were tasked with guarding the Ascended Sun Disc, a powerful artifact that held the key to unlocking the empire's true potential.

However, tragedy struck when the empire fell into ruin and was consumed by the sands of the desert. Renekton and Nasus were trapped beneath the shifting dunes, their bodies twisted and corrupted by the dark magic that permeated the land. Over the centuries, Renekton's mind deteriorated, and he became a savage beast, driven by an unquenchable rage and a desire to exact vengeance upon his brother.

In the world of League of Legends, Renekton is a champion known for his incredible strength and durability. He excels in close-quarters combat, using his massive blade and his ferocious abilities to tear through his enemies. Renekton's passive ability, Reign of Anger, empowers his abilities when he is below 50% health, allowing him to unleash devastating attacks and sustain himself in battle.

Renekton's Q ability, Cull the Meek, is a sweeping strike that damages enemies and heals Renekton for a portion of the damage dealt. This ability is perfect for sustaining in lane and trading blows with opponents. His W ability, Ruthless Predator, allows Renekton to stun his target and deal additional damage, making it a powerful tool for engaging and locking down enemies.

Renekton's E ability, Slice and Dice, is a versatile mobility tool that allows him to dash through enemies, dealing damage and reducing their armor. This ability can be used both defensively and offensively, making Renekton a formidable threat in team fights. Finally, his ultimate ability, Dominus, transforms Renekton into a massive crocodile, increasing his size, health, and damage output.

Renekton's strengths lie in his ability to dominate the early game and establish a strong presence in the top lane. His high base damage and sustain make him a formidable duelist, capable of winning trades and bullying his opponents. Additionally, Renekton's mobility and crowd control make him a valuable asset in team fights, as he can dive into the enemy backline and disrupt their carries.

However, Renekton also has his weaknesses. He is heavily reliant on his abilities to deal damage, which means that if he is unable to land his combos or is interrupted during his abilities, his damage output can be significantly reduced. Additionally, Renekton's effectiveness diminishes as the game progresses into the late game, where he can struggle to deal with tankier opponents and coordinated team fights.

In the world of League of Legends, Renekton has become a staple pick in the top lane. His aggressive playstyle and ability to dominate the laning phase make him a popular choice for players who enjoy asserting their dominance and snowballing their advantage. The Story of Renekton

Renekton's story is deeply intertwined with that of his brother, Nasus. Once noble Ascended warriors of Shurima, Renekton and Nasus were tasked with guarding the ancient empire's secrets. However, the power of the Sun Disc corrupted the empire, leading to its downfall. Renekton and Nasus were trapped in the ruins, their bodies twisted and their minds shattered by the dark magic that consumed them.

Renekton, driven mad by his imprisonment, became a monstrous being known as the Butcher of the Sands. He thirsts for blood and seeks to unleash his rage upon anyone who crosses his path. Renekton's abilities reflect his savage nature, allowing him to slice through his enemies with his massive blade and unleash devastating area-of-effect damage.

Despite his chaotic nature, Renekton still retains a sliver of his former self. Deep down, he yearns for freedom and seeks to reunite with his brother Nasus, hoping to find redemption and restore their shattered bond. The story of Renekton is a tragic one, filled with pain, anger, and a desperate struggle for control.

Strengths and Weaknesses

Renekton is a formidable champion with a unique playstyle that revolves around his fury resource. His strengths lie in his ability to dominate the early game, thanks to his high base damage and sustain. Renekton excels in short trades, using his abilities to quickly burst down opponents and then retreat before they can retaliate.

One of Renekton's greatest strengths is his ability to dive into team fights and disrupt the enemy backline. With his ultimate ability, Dominus, Renekton gains a massive health boost and deals damage to all nearby enemies. This makes him a formidable frontliner and allows him to soak up damage while his team follows up with their own attacks.

However, Renekton does have his weaknesses. He is heavily reliant on his abilities to deal damage, which means that if he misses his combo or is unable to engage properly, he can quickly become ineffective. Additionally, Renekton's fury resource can be difficult to manage, as it requires careful timing and decision-making to maximize his damage output.

Furthermore, Renekton's late game can be challenging. While he excels in the early and mid game, his damage falls off compared to other champions in the late game. This means that Renekton players need to capitalize on their early advantage and snowball the game to secure victory.

Renekton's Place in the Game

Renekton is primarily played in the top lane, where his aggressive playstyle and strong laning phase allow him to dominate his opponents. He is often picked as a counter to melee champions, as his abilities and sustain make it difficult for them to trade effectively.

Renekton's presence in the game is not limited to the top lane, however. In certain team compositions, Renekton can also be played as a jungler, taking advantage of his mobility and crowd control to gank lanes and secure objectives. His ability to dive into team fights and disrupt the enemy backline makes him a valuable asset in team play.

Overall, Renekton is a versatile champion who excels in the early game and can snowball a match if played correctly. His aggressive playstyle and high damage output make him a force to be reckoned with, and his Bloodfury Renekton skin only amplifies his intimidating presence on the battlefield.

Renekton's Outback Renekton skin is available for purchase in the in-game store for 975 RP. It was released on November 19, 2012, and has since become a popular choice among players who want to showcase their love for both Renekton and the Australian outback.

The Story of Outback Renekton

The Outback Renekton skin tells the story of Renekton's journey through the treacherous Australian outback. After being trapped in the sands of Shurima for centuries, Renekton finally found a way to escape his prison. As he emerged into the world once again, he discovered a portal that transported him to the vast and untamed wilderness of the Australian outback.

In this new environment, Renekton had to adapt to survive. He embraced the spirit of the outback, channeling the strength and resilience of the crocodiles that roamed the land. His skin took on a new appearance, resembling the scales of a crocodile, and his armor became adorned with tribal markings and symbols representing his newfound connection to the outback.

With his new look, Renekton became a force to be reckoned with. He roamed the outback, hunting down his enemies with ruthless precision. The power of the crocodile coursed through his veins, giving him an edge in battle that few could match. His ferocity and aggression were unmatched, earning him the title of the Butcher of the Sands.

Renekton's Strengths and Weaknesses

Renekton is a powerful champion with a unique set of strengths and weaknesses. Understanding these traits is crucial for players who want to master the Butcher of the Sands.

Strengths:

  • Dominant Laner: Renekton excels in the top lane, where his high damage output and sustain make him a formidable opponent.
  • Strong Early Game: Renekton's abilities allow him to dominate the early stages of the game, putting pressure on his lane opponent and potentially securing kills.
  • Great Duelist: With his ultimate ability, Dominus, Renekton becomes even more powerful in one-on-one fights, making him a threat to squishy champions.
  • Good Wave Clear: Renekton's Q ability, Cull the Meek, allows him to quickly clear minion waves, giving him lane control and the ability to roam.

Weaknesses:

  • Reliant on Fury: Renekton's abilities consume Fury, which he generates through auto-attacks. Managing Fury is crucial to maximizing his damage potential.
  • Item Dependent: Renekton relies on building items to remain relevant in the later stages of the game. Falling behind in gold can significantly impact his effectiveness.
  • Limited Crowd Control: While Renekton has some crowd control abilities, they are relatively short-ranged and require him to be in close proximity to his enemies.
  • Vulnerable to Kiting: Champions with high mobility or crowd control can make it difficult for Renekton to stick to his targets, reducing his overall impact in team fights.

Renekton's Place in the Game

Renekton has been a staple pick in the top lane for many years. His aggressive playstyle and strong laning phase make him a popular choice among players who enjoy dominating their opponents early on. Renekton's ability to snowball a lead and become a formidable split-pusher or team fighter makes him a versatile champion that can fit into various team compositions.

In professional play, Renekton has seen his fair share of action. His ability to create pressure in the top lane and draw jungle attention allows his team to make plays elsewhere on the map. Renekton's presence in team fights can be game-changing, especially when he can dive onto the enemy backline and disrupt their carries.

Overall, Renekton is a champion that rewards aggressive and calculated play. With the right combination of skill, strategy, and itemization, players can unleash the full potential of the Butcher of the Sands and dominate their opponents.

For more information about Renekton and his various appearances, including the Outback Renekton skin, be sure to visit our page dedicated to the champion. There, you can find detailed information, videos, and more to help you become a master of the Butcher of the Sands.
